DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to compare FBP-, hybrid IR-, and IMR techniques to assess their role in the identification of coronary artery disease and abnormalities in cardiac structures.
DOC.brief_title: Knowledge-based Iterative Model Reconstruction at Low-kilovoltage (kV) Cardiac Computed Tomography (CT)
DOC.criteria: A BMI of 27 kg/m2 or less and a coronary calcium score of less than 1,000 Agatston units. BMI exceeded 27 kg/m2 renal dysfunction (serum creatinine level > 1.5 mg/dl) atrial fibrillation prior coronary artery bypass grafting heart failure (New York Heart Association class IIIIV)
